接口的使用
org.springframework.format.FormatterRegistry

  • 使用FormatterRegistry的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.format
    An API for defining Formatters to format field model values for display in a UI.
    org.springframework.format.datetime
    Formatters for java.util.Date properties.
    org.springframework.format.datetime.joda
    Integration with Joda-Time for formatting Joda date and time types as well as standard JDK Date types.
    org.springframework.format.datetime.standard
    Integration with the JSR-310 java.time package in JDK 8.
    org.springframework.format.support
    Support classes for the formatting package, providing common implementations as well as adapters.

    • org.springframework.format中FormatterRegistry的使用

      参数类型为FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void FormatterRegistrar.registerFormatters(FormatterRegistry registry)
      Register Formatters and Converters with a FormattingConversionService through a FormatterRegistry SPI.

    • org.springframework.format.datetime中FormatterRegistry的使用

      参数类型为FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format.datetime中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void DateFormatterRegistrar.registerFormatters(FormatterRegistry registry) 

    • org.springframework.format.datetime.joda中FormatterRegistry的使用

      参数类型为FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format.datetime.joda中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void JodaTimeFormatterRegistrar.registerFormatters(FormatterRegistry registry) 

    • org.springframework.format.datetime.standard中FormatterRegistry的使用

      参数类型为FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format.datetime.standard中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void DateTimeFormatterRegistrar.registerFormatters(FormatterRegistry registry) 

    • org.springframework.format.support中FormatterRegistry的使用

      实现FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultFormattingConversionService
      A specialization of FormattingConversionService configured by default with converters and formatters appropriate for most applications.
      class  FormattingConversionService
      A ConversionService implementation designed to be configured as a FormatterRegistry.
      参数类型为FormatterRegistry的org.springframework.format.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void DefaultFormattingConversionService.addDefaultFormatters(FormatterRegistry formatterRegistry)
      Add formatters appropriate for most environments: including number formatters, JSR-354 Money & Currency formatters, JSR-310 Date-Time and/or Joda-Time formatters, depending on the presence of the corresponding API on the classpath.
